method.name: is_scene_capture_enabled
method.description: Checks if this extension is enabled.

method.name: is_scene_capture_supported
method.description: Checks if scene capture is supported.

method.name: request_scene_capture
method.description: Requests the user go through the scene capture process. The [signal scene_capture_completed] signal will be emitted when the process has completed.

signal.name: scene_capture_completed
signal.description: Emitted when the scene capture process is completed.
